text: I mean I’m not one 2 go for suicide but what if I’m done with this life. I have seen everything. Experienced everything. Great, Good bad ugly…all of it! And it’s kinda getting boring and repetitive! Why can’t I just leave? Is there a way? I wonder often imagining a secret exit
